casebody.data:
No. 09-1403. Erica P. John Fund, Inc., fka Archdiocese of Milwaukee Supporting Fund, Inc., Petitioner v. Halliburton Co., et al. 563 U.S. 931, 131 S. Ct. 1899,

179 L. Ed. 2d 798,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2823. April 15, 2011.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
